# Copilot Instructions for Issızlar Music Band Website

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a modern Next.js TypeScript website for the Turkish music band "Issızlar". The website features:

- Modern, clean design with minimal gradient usage
- Scroll animations and parallax effects using Framer Motion
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Professional color palette focused on readability and user engagement
- App Router architecture with TypeScript

## Design Guidelines
- Use a modern, professional color palette
- Minimize gradient usage - prefer solid colors and subtle shadows
- Ensure excellent readability and content accessibility
- Implement smooth scroll animations and parallax effects
- Maintain responsive design principles
- Focus on user engagement and clean content presentation

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion for animations
- Lucide React for icons
- Radix UI for accessible components

## Coding Standards
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Next.js App Router best practices
- Implement responsive design patterns
- Use semantic HTML elements
- Ensure accessibility standards
- Optimize for performance and SEO
